reviews.review_msg: Very nice man, the only thing is that his grading is not on the easy side, but it's not unfair either. He's VERY open to creativity, so you can make prior arrangements for your papers, and instead make the paper into a project. Very understandable, and easy going.

Paul is a wonderful person.Is SO approachable,caring completely for student needs&concerns.Lectures are sometimes rambly&attendance isnt mandatory,but still worth going to.Gives exceptional feedback to students on papers and presentations returning them promptly w/pagelong helpful comments and praises.Always very willing to help.Highly Recommended!

Well! She is a nice professor in terms of her teaching skills. But honestly, I was bored during her lectures. I would not suggest Colligan because she seems to lack that student-teacher bonding thing, which is important for me to be able to approach my instructor. Too professional and uptight! Need to loosen a little.
